      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109844</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Allergic reaction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Allergische Reaktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction allergique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação allergic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione allergica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλεργική αντίδραση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción alérgica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows what happens when a person undergoes an allergic reaction during an asthmatic attack. Allergens stimulates the release of histamine which, in turn, stimulates changes in the bronchioles. This results to the narrowing of airways, making breathing difficult.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">allergen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">allergy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">asthma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bronchioles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">histamime</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sensitisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, was geschieht, wenn eine 
Person eine allergische Reaktion während eines asthmatischen Angriffs
durchmacht. Allergene regt die Freisetzung von Histamin an, das 
der Reihe nach Änderungen in den Bronchiolen anregt. Dieses 
resultiert zum Verengen der Fluglinien und bildet die Atmung 
schwierig.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre ce qui se produit quand 
une personne subit une réaction allergique pendant une attaque 
asthmatique. Les allergènes stimule la version de l'histamine 
qui, alternativement, stimule des changements des bronchioles. 
Ceci résulte au rétrécissement des voies aériennes, rendant 
la respiration difficile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o que acontece quando 
uma pessoa se submete a uma reação allergic durante um ataque 
asthmatic. Os allergens estimulam a liberação do histamine 
que, por sua vez, estimula mudanças nos bronchioles. Isto 
resulta a estreitar-se dos airways, fazendo respirar difícil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che cosa accade 
quando una persona subisce una reazione allergica durante l'attacco 
asthmatic. Gli allergeni stimola la versione di istamina che, a 
sua volta, stimola i cambiamenti nei bronchioli. Ciò risulta 
allo stringimento delle vie aeree, rendente la respirazione difficile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τι συμβαίνει πότε ένα 
πρόσωπο υποβάλλεται σε μια αλλεργική αντίδραση κατά τη διάρκεια 
μιας ασθματικής επίθεσης. Τα αλλεργιογόνα υποκινούν την 
έκδοση της ισταμίνης που, στη συνέχεια, υποκινεί τις αλλαγές στα 
βρογχιόλια. Αυτό οδηγεί στο στένεμα των εναέριων 
διαδρόμων, καθιστώντας την αναπνοή δύσκολη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra qué sucede cuando una 
persona experimenta una reacción alérgica durante un ataque 
asmático. Los alergénicos estimulan el desbloquear de la 
histamina que, alternadamente, estimula cambios en los bronquiolos. 
Esto resulta a enangostar de vías aéreas, haciendo la 
respiración difícil.</string>
          </description>
